item.description:
Comedy Night Competition Finals at Gas Lamp Grille
August 19, 2010
8:00 PM

The fee has been $5.00pp. I was told I can call for a discount if we get a group together.

This week is Competition Finals for the Summer Series of Comedy.
Every event has been different and very funny! It is a blast.

Gas Lamp Grille has been having comedy nights random Thursday nights once a month.

The last comedians I previewed were comedians that have been at The Comedy Connection in East Providence.

We can celebrate with Drinks, and Apps or Dinner - the food is great..

Hope to see you there.

Please keep your RSVP accurate so that I can schedule seating for our group appropriately. We had front rows last event at Gas Lamp : ).

Updates may be made to this page so check back when notified...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask hostess for Newport meetup group - any trouble finding our tables please call Mark at: 631-433-5223
item.name: Comedy Competition Finals - Drinks and/or Food at Gas Lamp Grille
